arguments.template:
<sky-list [data]="items" [defaultView]="grid">
  <sky-list-toolbar>
    <sky-list-secondary-actions>
      <sky-list-secondary-action>
        <button type="button">
          Option
        </button>
      </sky-list-secondary-action>
    </sky-list-secondary-actions>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (A - Z)"
      field="column2"
      [descending]="false"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (Z - A)"
      field="column2"
      [descending]="true"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
  </sky-list-toolbar>

  <sky-list-view-grid fit="scroll" #grid>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="column1"
      heading="Column1"
      [isSortable]="false">
    </sky-grid-column>
    <sky-grid-column field="column2" heading="Column2">
    </sky-grid-column>
  </sky-list-view-grid>
 </sky-list>

<sky-list [data]="items" [defaultView]="grid">
  <sky-list-toolbar>
    <sky-list-secondary-actions>
      <sky-list-secondary-action>
        <button type="button">
          Option
        </button>
      </sky-list-secondary-action>
    </sky-list-secondary-actions>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (A - Z)"
      field="column2"
      [descending]="false"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
    <sky-list-toolbar-sort
      label="Fruit name (Z - A)"
      field="column2"
      [descending]="true"
      type="string"
    >
    </sky-list-toolbar-sort>
  </sky-list-toolbar>

  <sky-list-view-grid fit="scroll" #grid>
    <sky-grid-column
      field="column1"
      heading="Column1"
      [isSortable]="false">
    </sky-grid-column>
    <sky-grid-column field="column2" heading="Column2">
    </sky-grid-column>
  </sky-list-view-grid>
 </sky-list>
